name: UX Research Projects Management Board
description:
Concept: This is a digital board to track down all your research projects over the year (up to 20 projects per Quarter).


End users: UX Researchers, Research Managers, and Product Designers who also conduct in-depth user research.


Main purposes you can use this board for:


  1. You can enter specific information about the project, milestone & deliverable timelines, and links of interest.
  2. You can use chips to indicate the status of both the overall project and the specific milestones & deliverables.


The design has been inspired by the "Portfolio Management Board" by pmxboard Store.


Hope you find it useful and please drop a message with your feedback! Many thanks!!
